reviews.text:
Que buenas carnes, crudas y en parrilla, ni hablar de las empanadas.
NO HAY PARQUEADERO TERRIBLE

I spent one of my birthdays at this spot and had a wonderful time. The restaurant lives up to the chatter. This restaurant knows good taste. The employees displayed consistent friendliness. Visit this restaurant - you'll become a repeat customer.
Regular Argentinian food. Prices are little high, for the price Queens offers better places

Just to be clear that I‚Äôm giving only 1 star to Service because the interaction that I have as soon as I get inside the restaurant with one of their waitresses.

She gave me a disdainful look and spoke rudely. She didn't care what I was saying and continued on her way. I asked to speak to a manager. He explained further and apologized.

I‚Äôve been living in United States for over 27 years, that was my second time there, unfair that I had that service.
Hopefully, I was able to choose another waitress, and everything went fine with her.

Apenas entraba al restaurante una mesera con muy mala actitud y de malhumor me dio una mesa que no quise tomar, me dej√≥ hablando, se dio la media vuelta y se retir√≥.
Tampoco quiero que me besen los pies, pero al menos que sean un poco amables y agradables.
Las otras meseras me atendieron muy bien, no puedo quejarme ni de la comida, ni de la atenci√≥n de ellas.

Siendo yo Argentinx, me da pena que teniendo 24 a√±os viviendo en Nueva York me pase esto en un restaurante que vengo por primera vez.
Good steaks!

Una parrillada deliciosa al punto , la sangr√≠a √∫nica no mienten los comentarios q dicen ser la mejor de New York te dan una entrada deliciosa , en fin al comer ahi me traslado a Argentina de inmediato

On behalf of The Center for the Women of New York, I want to extend our heartfelt thanks to La Esquina Criolla for their generous and delicious donation of empanadas to our Taste of the World at Fort Totten gala.

La Esquina Criolla‚Äôs empanadas were, as always, a huge hit‚Äîflaky, golden pastry wrapped around savory, well-seasoned fillings. Each bite was packed with authentic flavor and made with the kind of care and tradition that keeps guests coming back for more. It‚Äôs no surprise that their empanadas have become a beloved staple at our event!

We‚Äôre so grateful for La Esquina Criolla‚Äôs ongoing support and dedication to our cause. It‚Äôs because of wonderful local businesses like theirs that we‚Äôre able to raise essential funds to support women across New York. Their continued generosity makes a real difference in our community.

We highly recommend La Esquina Criolla for their consistently delicious empanadas and their big-hearted commitment to giving back. Thank you for helping make our event a success yet again
Very casual place for good beef cuts.  Ihad the short ribs and beef tongue here.
Riquisimo todo todo todo
Deliciosa comida y buen servicio.
Love this restaurant,  great food, great service.   We highly recommend.
Encantador.  Muito buen los precios

Muy rica la comida, pero la atenci√≥n de Amalia fue muy mala, prefiere estar hablando con sus amistades, antes que recibir tu pedido, ella no merece estar en ese lugar, har√° que pierda toda su clientela
Good food a bit small inside feels crowed, service is decent

I've been coming to this non-presumptive Argentinian steak house since the 90's. It has probably been around since the mid to late 70's or even before that. And that's because they have retained the repeat clients and new one's because of how good their steaks and prices are. Their steaks are "scrumptuous." I have a sirloin steak with mashed potatoes and the Russian salad with a glass of red house wine, and I leave very satisfied each time. And can't wait till the next time that I can go for a juicy perfectly cut and quality steak cooked over fire.

Hoy mi√©rcoles 11 de junio fui a conocer este restaurante de parillada Argentina. Para empezar no da un aspecto de muy limpio pero bueno .Ped√≠ una parrilla para una persona y le especifique que quer√≠a el asado y la entra√±a de la parrilla termin√≥ medio que me gustaba la carne jugosa con ensalada rusa.Medium. Cuando me trajo la parrilla que tenia un pedacito de entra√±a chiquito ,recontra re cocido y el asado no estaba jugoso pero estaba comible.Comi las mollejas y el asado y pedi la cuenta.La ensala rusa no tenia una pisca de sal , de lo mas desabrido.Llame a la mesera y le dije que eso no era as√≠ , la se√±ora me escucho pero no me respondi√≥ absolutamente nada.La atmosfera si vas con la intenci√≥n de que haya una atmosfera familiar y con alguna clase  m√∫sica Argentina ,nada que ver una depresi√≥n total el ambiente. Lo pero vino cuando me acerque al que trabaja en la parrilla y le dije disculpa yo ped√≠ una parrilla a termino Medium y me mandastes un pedacito chiquito de entra√±a cortada a la mitad que la dejastes como zuela de zapato y recontra cocida.Es preferible que sirvan ese mismo pedacito peque√±o sin cortarlo a la mitad y quede como suela porqie ahora yo pague por algo que se va a ir a la basura .Y para mi sorpresa muy groseramente me respondi√≥ aqu√≠ los due√±os trabajan as√≠ y le dije disculpa me imagino que los due√±os son Argentinos y d√©jame decirte que la mayor√≠a de nosotros los Argentinos y Uruguayos nos gusta la carne jugosa a t√©rmino medio pero yo dudo mucho que el due√±o diga que tu debes darle la carne re cocida a a los clientes porque por algo la mesera te pregunta el termino de la carne que uno como cliente lo quiere.El ordinario me dijo bueno tirelo y ya .La cual el tono, la groser√≠a y lo ordinario y mala atenci√≥n fue increible.En ves de decir disculpe se√±ora por esa experiencia la pr√≥xima lo har√© mejor .Un reverendo ordinario que es una verg√ºenza que uno pague que la comida no sea como la pedistes y encima que hace la parrilla sea un grosero ordinario que no sabe nada carne , que no es Argentino o Uruguayo que son los mejores haciendo carne.Y  que le falte el respeto a los clientes .Yo no recomiendo absolutamente a nadie que vaya ah√≠. Y Ojal√° el due√±o en alg√∫n momento cambie ese parrillero no solo porque no tiene experiencia sino por lo grosero, ordinario y mal educado.Fui desde Manhattan a disfrutar de una parrilla y pase horrible
Creo quenes muy buena comida a precio c√≥modo
T√≠pico restaurante argentino con buena comida
Great place for asado or other Argentinean favorites. Relaxed atmosphere and good staff
Excelentes carnes para hacer asado, buenos precios y excelente atencion al cliente
The best!
It's a corner butcher that also serves great parilla. The waitresses are the nicest.

Primero q nada la atenci√≥n p√©sima, por el hecho q te incluyen la propina no les interesa atenci√≥n al cliente. Segundo ped√≠ un sif√≥n de agua y parec√≠a q lo ten√≠an en la jardiner√≠a por lo sucio q estaba, no les dio ni un poco de verg√ºenza.
Pesimo servicio de las se√±oras, estaba esperando mi comida que llame para retirar y me corrieron de la Mesa
The food its okay, but the service is terrible!!! The waitress had very bad energy to serve us because she was watching TV!! never again!
Old school Argentinan steakhouse/ butcher shop . Love it
La mejor parilla en NY !

Las meseras: esas dos se√±ora que est√°n ah√≠ deben de ir a cuidar a sus nietos no tienen buena atenci√≥n y te traen la cuenta sin que usted se la pida, cambien esas dos se√±oras mayores!
Yo no regreso m√°s por muy mal atenci√≥n

La comida rica, pero la atenci√≥n de las dos se√±oras que est√°n ah√≠, pesimo, no saben tener modales, deben de tener m√°s atenci√≥n, sin pedir la cuenta me traen como botando a las personas, deben de poner personas m√°s amablesüò†
Las empanadas son muy buenas üëç
Best parrilladas
Todo muy rico

Waitress was rude but rest of the staff was great. Food was served quickly and they were very kind to help me choose the meal. Amazing food! Waitress wouldn‚Äôt let me eat inside since I walked in but ordered my food Togo. Usually you can take a quick bite inside a restaurant. This one was pretty empty but she said I am not allowed to eat there so I left. She was also rude in the beginning as well.
The quality at this restaurant has gone seriously down
I come here on the reg. The best by far. Even my children enjoy eating here. They specialize in grilled meats.  Flavor is off the charts, friendly service, and for the quality the price is very low.

Venimos aca a cenar varias veces con mi marido. Soy argentina y tenia ganas de comer una entra√±a y fui a la esquina criolla. Nos atendieron asi nomas, las meseras nunca se acercaron a preguntar como estabamos ni si todo estaba bien salvo cuando teniamos los platos vacios y ni siquiera nos ofrecieron postre, nos estaban corriendo porque tenian a una familia esperando. Habia un hombre sentado en la mesa de al lado y las meseras siempre cada vez que pasaban al lado de el le pregutaban si necesitaban algo y la verdad es que senti que solo a nosotros nos trataron mal. No se que paso para que las meseras me trataran a mi y a mi marido asi porque no hubo conflictos. Soy argentina y la verdad que estoy decepcionada. Mejor hubiera ido al restaurante del frente llamado el Gauchito que dan un mejor servicio y son super atentos.

Best Criolla ever! Came here for my birthday- the waitress was on point.
The food-we had empanadas, provolone a la parilla, sangria, croquetas, chimichurri- authentically made!!! The food will transport you to Argentina! Thank you for hosting us and making my day extra special!
Good food, very small  place
Great portion for the mixed grill. The skirt steak and short rib are exceptionally juicy and tender.
The food is good, the menu is üëç

P√©sima experiencia en este sitio, p√©simo servicio las meseras hacen un trabajo p√©simo tratando incorrectamente a sus clientes! Ped√≠ una parrillada y muy poca carne, ped√≠ unos chunchilines y estaban todos quemados.
No volver√© a este sitio m√°s !
Muy buena comida ..

I gave a 3 stars review mainly for the food. I ordered Parrillada Completa para 1 and Ensalada.

First come appetizer bread + butter and I have no idea what it was, sliced meat. That was really good.

Then, the main course Parrillada Completa came. The steak is okay, cant complaint, but the rest was very standard. They didnt come with any salsa, i was expecting they came with green or red sauce.

Well i was very highly anticipated because got recommended by my Argentinian friend, but probably this is just not for me. Maybe i will give another chance to order another dish next time.

Gran experiencia, la carne ni se diga u si realmente quiere comer carne a la parrilla, tiene que visitar este restaurante, mi esposa y yo pedimos lomito y rabioles de queso al puesto, y realmente estuvo todo riqu√≠simo.

Nos atendi√≥ la se√±ora Iris que siempre esta con su buena energ√≠a y con su carisma, gracias iris por su servicio y por supuesto a las dem√°s chicas tambi√©n.

Las cervezas quilmes tambi√©n est√°n disponibles y son una delicia para acompa√±ar las carnes.

This place has great steak! I had the entra√±a for two, they cook the steak to your liking. The give you bread and and chorizo parrillero as an entry. The price is not expensive for the amount of food and service. The chimichurri is delicious! 5 stars for sure. My family comes here all the time.

My wife is from Argentina and she needs her fix of Argentinian food. She likes this place the best out of all the Argentinian restaurants. Perfectly grilled and tender meats. Great tasting sangria to go with your food. Always get a grill of meats for 2 or 4 people depending if it's just me and her or 2 other people with us. I love their skirt steak, it was cooked exactly how I requested. Side of maduros and morcilla and I'm in heaven.

Love this place, I come here for years and I always recommend üëå ‚ù§ for meat lovers. Sangria is awesome food im surprised they don't have a bigger spot but I guess that's how they keep such a great quality. To the owner a siber hand shake üòÜ. Felicidades y gracias por su local y buen servicio y calidad de comida.

La Esquina Criolla has been on our bucket list. We were eager with protein, meat in a Sunday afternoon and decided to try this place which served solid Argentinian barbecue with convenient grab and go by phone.

We ordered La Parrillada for 2 and the portion was more than enough for 3-4 people with great price. The sides were not special but were perfect add-on to the entrees. The quality of meat wasn‚Äôt the best and even had coppery smell but tasted delicious especially with their unique sauce.

El lugar no es muy grande y las mesas est√°n un poco juntas unas de otras. Para comer, la opcion de parrillada es excelente. Sabrosa y cortes argentinos que muestran el verdadero sabor de ese pais. Las milanesas, aunque excesivamente condimentadas, estan bien. Las empanadas en cambio, no las recomiendo porque en este caso, no son las cl√°sicas argentinas: la masa muy gruesa y sin sabor y el relleno, casi parec√≠a picadillo. Los postres son deliciosos. El servicio est√° muy bien tambi√©n. Las bebidas son envasadas y no hay recarga como podr√≠as estar acostumbrado.
Tambi√©n tiene disponible venta de cortes de carne y yerba mate, mate cocido y algunos pocos productos regionales. No hay estacionamiento, deber√≠as dejar el auto en la calle y puede ser dif√≠cil de encontrar lugar. El barrio, lamentablemente no es muy limpio. Hay suciedad en las calles y las motos pasan a velocidad excesiva por la zona. En el √°rea hay una comunidad grande latinoamericana y negocios de diferentes paises.
The absolute Argentinian bomb!!! Love this place, from there empanadas to their skirt steak (entrana) sandwich. They also sell milanesas to make at home üòã‚Ä¶

Tasty steak and side orders! Their empanadas and chimmichurri sauce go hand in hand! Their salmon is good as well! I love their steak sandwiches as well. This place is always a go to for my friends and I when we‚Äôre craving steak!
Awesome place thank to my uncle food was unbelievably great as you can see in the pictures truly a gem
Great portions. Authentic. Love the place. Little on the pricey side but expected nowadays anywhere in NY.

Aut√©ntica comida Argentina , platos abundantes , ambiente familiar , buenos precios y gran atenci√≥n de Mayra .
Gracias de Buenos Aires, Cordoba y Maryland USA
This place is amazing great service, clean ,friendly atmosphere, omg and the food was amazing. I definitely recommend it ,this deserves more than 5 stars. Try it you won't be disappointed

Muy buena atenci√≥n üëè  siempre pendiente de que estemos bien, muy rico el ri√±on asado y la parrilada, adem√°s el chimichurri excelente nada grasoso y la ensalada muy rica. Ser√° mi parrilada preferida.‚Ä¶

Always a great experience in here. Steak is consistently great, the sandwiches are wonderful, and the service was both quick and friendly. I don't live in the area anymore, but any time I am it's on my must-visit list
Uno de los mejores parrillas argentinas en Queens , buen servicio, buen sazon y carne fresca. Buena atencion al cliente. Recomendado 100%

I have been frequenting this establishment for about 15 years. I do not go for the service. I do not go for the ambiance. I go for the skirt steak sandwich. Personally, I order it plain (just the skirt steak with a bit of salt on a hero), but there are many ways to customize it according to taste. Def worth a stop if you're in the neighborhood.

La Esquina has been here as long as I can remember. 40-50 years. I‚Äôve lived in the the neighborhood most of my life. Service exceptional. Food fantastic. I come regularly for their empanadas chicken and ground beef and they have fried beef.  But anything you want here you can not go wrong.
this place is wonderful, and right next to it you'll find Confiter√≠a R√≠o de la Plata ( best medialunas -croissants- in New York City by far). Little Argentina I might call it.
Great food, friendly staff, will be visiting again.
Been going to this place for years. Abad and Tony who manage the place know their meats. Miguel grills the steaks to perfection. A must for steak lovers on a budget.

My favorite Argentinian Restaurant by far! I love the fact that its affordable! the highlights are the sweetbreads sandwich and steak sandwich. Their empanadas are excellent. I also like the fact that they sell freshly made sausage and other Argentinian food that can be cooked at home. Highly recommend this restaurant!

The food here is always fantastic. Very authentic. Great prices, big portions, very high quality meats. The wait staff is very attentive. My family has been going here for years and years. We all love it!
Es muy peque√±o el lugar, pero se come delicioso

This place is by far the best Argentinian restaurant I've ever gone to.  My father grew up in the area and has gone here since he was young.  We still come here every time I am in the states.  Their empanadas are the best I have ever eaten,‚Ä¶
